title: What is pes(rr) college fees through kcet?
content: I wanted to know whether the fees is â‚¹1,07,000 as mentioned in kea website or is it still more. Coz everyone I asked here tell me that pes is expensive

comments.body: afaik the total fees per year is around 1.37L
How can u breakdown for me plis.
1.07 as tuiton fees, 20k as exam fees and 10k as scholarship fees(optional)

20k is exam fee?? Didn't kea tell 20k is already included in above 1 lakh smth fees in their fee structure document?
And I have to pay 20k extra every year?
I'm asking what this extra fee is. And do I have to pay it every year? And why bcuz kewnalready said 20k smt is included in above fees of 1.lakh smth

Yes every year 

30k extra if u want scholarship benefits and 20k extra if you don't want any scholarship benefits

Ok got it but like
Why do I have to pay 20k extra EVERY YEAR? 
If it were smth for whole 4 years of understand. And what abt least statement in fee structure pdf which says 20k included in above fees of 1,07,495?
Extra fee is actually 50k in which 20k is paid to kea already and remaining 20/30k you pay to pes or any other clg you go

Wtf , it works like that? I just assumed total extra fee was 20k.
Then what's the tuition fee?
By that logic a college can charge whatever they want as extra fee bruh, no use of regulation.

10k is exam fees and some 11k extra is for library e-resources and recreation fees. It is 96,574 as tuition fees 10k as exam fees and 11,426 as extra fees for library and stuff which I just added into the exam fees to make it simpler. Your total fees till you graduate will be 1.2L per year (if you opt out of scholarship)

So my scholarship amt refund is based on 96kish amt right? Or full amt.
And everything apart from 10k for scholarship is compulsory right?
Nah from this year onwards it's for your full fees you paid and yes apart from the scholarship everything is mandatory
Whut? Do you mean dm? Sure you can dm
